profileText: A Representative from Maryland; birth date unknown; member of the State house of delegates, 1807-1808; elected as a Republican to the Eleventh and served until his resignation in 1810 (March 4, 1809-1810); reelected to the Twelfth Congress, but resigned before the close of the Eleventh Congress, to accept an appointment as clerk of the court of Queen Anne's County, Md., which office he held until his death in Centerville, Queen Anne's County, December 13, 1815; interment in Chesterfield Cemetery.

note.content: Resigned in 1810, before the commencement of the Twelfth Congress, to which he had been elected.
